definition: solstice/the winter solstice 冬至 and summer solstice 夏至

sentences.english: This year’s festival was held June 16-23. For more details, see the Silverdocs Web site.

sentences.english: The meeting is to be held on Jeju Island of the ROK from May 29 to 30.

sentences.english: US Special Representative for DPRK Policy Bosworth will visit China from January 5 to 6.

sentences.english: As of today, no new cases suggestive of H5N1 infection have been detected since 22 May.

sentences.english: The Summer Olympic Games take place in Beijing from 8-24 August.

sentences.english: The UK delegation will visit Yunnan from March 19 to 20.

sentences.english: Erythema migrans appears at the bite site after three days to a month.

sentences.english: This year's meeting takes place from 16-25 May.
sentences.chinese: 本年度的會議將於5月16日至25日召開。

sentences.english: The peloton rides July 5 between Brussels and Spa.
